text: Alexander Jacob Betts Goss (also known as Alejandro Betts; 28 October 1947 - 13 March 2020) was an Argentine air-traffic controller and historian. He worked with the Argentine government as a Technical Advisor on the Tierra del Fuego Malvinas Question Provincial Observatory Advisory Council. Betts supported Argentina's claim to the Falkland Islands and is a controversial figure in the Falklands as a result. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine writers Category:Argentine politicians Category:Historians
title: Alejandro Betts
